properties.name: fraglink.base.url
properties.description: The Base URL of the resource which will provide Linked data fragments (e.g. https://fragments.myproject.com

properties.name: fraglink.page.maxStatements
properties.description: (Optional) The maximum number of statements returned in each page of a Linked Data Fragment partial representation

properties.name: fraglink.dataset.description
properties.description: (Optional) A brief description about the underlying dataset.

properties.name: fraglink.fragment.name
properties.description: (Optional) A name for the returned fragment resource.

properties.name: fraglink.fragment.description
properties.description: (Optional) A brief description about the returned fragment resource.
